pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydrating Foaming Gel Cleanser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Moisture rich with natural AHAs and botanicals to cleanse but not strip. Removes make-up, dirt and impurities whilst leaving skin soft. PEG and SLS free

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • A vitamin C and gentle natural AHA Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime to rejuvenate the complexion • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Cushioning botanicals of Avocado, Calendula, Rosehip and Evening Primrose to leave skin feeling soft • Naturally astringent Witch Hazel • Calming Chamomile and Aloe Vera

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Laurylglucosides, Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Syzygium Luehmannii Fruit (Lilly Pilly) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit (Rosehip) Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana Leaf (Witch Hazel) Extract, Vanillin, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethyl Acetate, Cyclohexane, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene* Linalool*

Directions

Apply a small amount to moist hands and lather with water. Gently massage into skin and then rinse thoroughly. Use daily or often as required.
